summary: These are Armor and Clothing replacers (no .esp) from my personal game.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Personal Clothing and Armor
Author: Edhildil
07,1,2014
ver1




[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

These are Armor and Clothing replacers (no .esp) from my personal game. They are weighted for BBP. I'm posting this as a response to a request.

I have made these from a custom body shape and I do not expect to make these for any other body type. The weight size is fixed to the custom body. Some meshes vary.

Some of the armors were made with Amidianborn's texture in mind, so if you use those textures the armors should look better.

They are skimpy so expect a lot of skin.

[img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/3664/updatesb.png[/img]

I will add files from time to time so if you like these keep an eye out for added files. So far this is what is here:

Beggar Clothes
Blades Armor
Chef and Bartender (Vanilla Bartender comes in two colors, mine only comes in one, may update later)
Dragonborn Armors (Chitin Heavy, Chitin Light, Nordic Carved, Stahlrim Heavy, Stahlrim Light)
Dragonborn Clothes ( Cultist, Dark Elf, Telvanni, so far)
Dwarven Armor
Ebony Armor
Skimpy Robes (archmage, mageapprentice, magejourneyman, monk, necromancer, robedarkbrotherhood, robemythicdawn, thalmor, warlock)

They are in different files for you to pick and choose.

I have now added a second pack of clothing.

Pack 2 includes these items:

Fine Raiment
Fur Trimmed Cloak
Hammerfell Garb
Redguard Clothes
Miners Clothing
Refined Tunic
Tavern Clothes
Wedding Dress (Original skirt mesh by Ashara)
Merchant Clothing
Fine Clothes (Brown)
Fine Clothes (Blue and Green)
Fine Clothes (Blue and Grey)
Fine Clothes (Green and Orange)
Jester Clothes*
Jester Hat*

Some of these clothes in Pack 2 can only be aquired thru console commands. You can easily get the codes by searching for Skyrim Clothing Codes on the internet. Some of them are only worn by NPC's in Skyrim.

* The Jester Items are designed from the Jester Outfit Retexture mod by Messias Mummo. Not using this mod will make the outfit look horrible. I highly recommend this mod anyway as the vanilla textures are ugly to me. Use the retexture file included in the mod, you can find it here:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17530/?]Jester Outfit Retexture[/url]

[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]

Dragonborn outfit files require Dragonborn DLC (see file page)

Calientes CBBE body mod installed and running in your game.(textures)

BBP Skeletons and animations ( You CTD without the skeleton!)


[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]


Unzip Data file to a temporary location
Check folder paths and make adjustments if needed
copy/paste into Skyrim folder.

[img]http://img194.imageshack.us/img194/9223/bugske.png[/img]

This is a replacer so if you use a mod that redirects any of these clothes or armor it could override this mod.

To get the Telvanni outfit you will have to use the console code (press `) player.additem"xxxxxxxx",1
The X's are where you type in the code and depending on your load order the number will be different.
Mine was 060376ed I think because Dragon born was 06 in NMM load order.

you may be able to use this mod also but I havent tested it yet:
Enchantable Telvanni Robes and Dunmer Outfits by Rangarig
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31854/?


Uninstallation:

There are many files here, basically delete or overwrite the mesh files in each installment.


[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Caliente for CBBE
NPR (Chef and Bartender leggings)
Edhildil (these new meshes)
Bethesda (original meshes)

Tools used:
=======
Blender
Nifscope
FRAPS
Paint
GIMP 2


Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod.
author: Edhildil
